answers.author: Robert Kiely
answers.text:
Mark, The City of Lake Forest's purchasing directive is silent regarding the City's posting of bid opportunities on the web site. It neither requires or prohibits it, provided that we still recieve all bids in a sealed envelope. I would be interested in seeing any such policy.

Mark, I would direct you to contact someone with the City of Santa Monica.  We are a service provide and as part of that process we registered on-line for the bidding process.  Now that we are in the system we routinely receive notices for bids being sought in our areas of interest.  Our original bids were still submitted via hardcopy but the solicitation and interaction all the way up to submittal was accomplished electronically.
